content:
I want to get the information of my friend james on Twitter. Can you provide me with the data?
Begin!

Okay, I will first search for Twitter data related to "James". Let me get the profile information using a username—you either need to confirm the username or provide more details if I find multiple candidates. I'll proceed now.

name: user_by_screen_name_for_twitter_v2_v2
